languages.text: Капитан патруля нехотя признает, что неоспоримых доказательств нет — в этой системе какое-то время также орудуют пираты. Однако это ничего не меняет, ибо нет у слуг Его милосердия к врагам Человечества.

The patrol's captain reluctantly admits that there is no conclusive proof — this system is sometimes the target of pirate raids. However, this changes nothing, for His servants have no mercy for the enemies of Humanity.
languages.original_text: Капитан патруля нехотя признает, что неоспоримых доказательств нет — в этой системе какое-то время также орудуют пираты. Однако это ничего не меняет, ибо нет у слуг Его милосердия к врагам Человечества.

traits.locale_text: The patrol's captain reluctantly admits that there is no conclusive proof — this system is sometimes the target of pirate raids. However, this changes nothing, for His servants have no mercy for the enemies of Humanity.

The patrol's captain reluctantly admits that there is no conclusive proof — this system is sometimes the target of pirate raids. However, this changes nothing, for His servants have no mercy for the enemies of Humanity.

languages.text: 巡逻队的舰长不情愿地承认，他们手头并没有确凿的证据，他们只知道这个星系时不时会成为海盗袭击的目标。然而，这改变不了什么，因为神皇的仆人不该对人类之敌抱有怜悯之心。
languages.original_text: The patrol's captain reluctantly admits that there is no conclusive proof — this system is sometimes the target of pirate raids. However, this changes nothing, for His servants have no mercy for the enemies of Humanity.

traits.locale_text: 巡逻队的舰长不情愿地承认，他们手头并没有确凿的证据，他们只知道这个星系时不时会成为海盗袭击的目标。然而，这改变不了什么，因为神皇的仆人不该对人类之敌抱有怜悯之心。

languages.text: パトロール隊の船長は、決定的な証拠がないことを渋々ながら認めたが、この星系は時として海賊の襲撃の標的となっている。しかし、それでも何も変わらない。神のしもべたちは、人類の敵に慈悲を与えることはないのだ。
languages.original_text: The patrol's captain reluctantly admits that there is no conclusive proof — this system is sometimes the target of pirate raids. However, this changes nothing, for His servants have no mercy for the enemies of Humanity.

traits.locale_text: パトロール隊の船長は、決定的な証拠がないことを渋々ながら認めたが、この星系は時として海賊の襲撃の標的となっている。しかし、それでも何も変わらない。神のしもべたちは、人類の敵に慈悲を与えることはないのだ。

languages.text: El capitán de la patrulla admite a su pesar que no hay pruebas concluyentes. Este sistema es a veces el blanco de incursiones piratas. Sin embargo, esto no cambia nada, pues sus siervos no tienen piedad con los enemigos de la Humanidad.
languages.original_text: The patrol's captain reluctantly admits that there is no conclusive proof — this system is sometimes the target of pirate raids. However, this changes nothing, for His servants have no mercy for the enemies of Humanity.

traits.locale_text: El capitán de la patrulla admite a su pesar que no hay pruebas concluyentes. Este sistema es a veces el blanco de incursiones piratas. Sin embargo, esto no cambia nada, pues sus siervos no tienen piedad con los enemigos de la Humanidad.

languages.text: Der Captain der Patrouille gesteht widerwillig, dass es keine handfesten Beweise gibt. Dieses System ist manchmal Ziel von Piratenüberfällen. Das ändert aber nichts, denn die Diener des Imperators kennen keine Gnade gegenüber den Feinden der Menschheit.
languages.original_text: The patrol's captain reluctantly admits that there is no conclusive proof — this system is sometimes the target of pirate raids. However, this changes nothing, for His servants have no mercy for the enemies of Humanity.

traits.locale_text: Der Captain der Patrouille gesteht widerwillig, dass es keine handfesten Beweise gibt. Dieses System ist manchmal Ziel von Piratenüberfällen. Das ändert aber nichts, denn die Diener des Imperators kennen keine Gnade gegenüber den Feinden der Menschheit.

languages.text: Le capitaine de la patrouille admet à contrecœur qu'il n'existe pas de preuve formelle, ce système étant parfois la cible des pirates. Pour autant, cela ne change rien, car Ses serviteurs n'ont aucune pitié pour les ennemis de l'humanité.
languages.original_text: The patrol's captain reluctantly admits that there is no conclusive proof — this system is sometimes the target of pirate raids. However, this changes nothing, for His servants have no mercy for the enemies of Humanity.

traits.locale_text: Le capitaine de la patrouille admet à contrecœur qu'il n'existe pas de preuve formelle, ce système étant parfois la cible des pirates. Pour autant, cela ne change rien, car Ses serviteurs n'ont aucune pitié pour les ennemis de l'humanité.

languages.text: Devriye gemisi kaptanı, kesin bir kanıt olmadığını isteksizce kabul ediyor. Bu sistem bazen korsan baskınlarının hedefi oluyor. Ancak O'nun hizmetkârlarının İnsanlık düşmanlarına merhameti olmadığından bu hiçbir şeyi değiştirmiyor.
languages.original_text: The patrol's captain reluctantly admits that there is no conclusive proof — this system is sometimes the target of pirate raids. However, this changes nothing, for His servants have no mercy for the enemies of Humanity.
